General.Name: Zhejiang Natural Outdoor Goods Inc.
General.Description: Zhejiang Natural Outdoor Goods Inc. supplies air mattresses and outdoor bags in the outdoor sports industry in China and internationally. The company's products primarily include automatic inflatable mattresses, inflatable beds, waterproof bags, ice bags, pillows, seat cushions, TPU composite fabrics, etc. Zhejiang Natural Outdoor Goods Inc. was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Taizhou, China.

1.Name: Yimin  Dong
1.Title: Director,Deputy Gen. Mang. and Board Sec.
